name: Multi-Column Tumblr Dash
description: Gives 2 or 3 or 5 column Dashboard. You can browse your dash much faster this way!
additional_info:
Updated on 2021-08-21 after tumblr changed things a lot

Updated on 2021-04-19 after tumblr changed things a lot

Updated on 2021-03-18 after tumblr changed things and messed up vertical alignment

Updated to support really wide screens - such as 4K - with 5 columns

Updated again to fix NEXT/PREV button layout, and narrow the NEW POST header

Updated this to deal with tumblr update - the new CSS is a bit different, and the classes are jumbled.

Old Bug (pre-2020-03-26 update): Current version expands the height of the bottom element by 100,000 pixels as a crude workaround for a post blanking bug. I'd appreciate help figuring out a better fix for this. Thanks!
